org.pathvisio.core.view

Class ShapeRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pathvisio.core.view.ShapeRegistry

  • public class ShapeRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    The Shape registry stores all arrow heads and shapes at this moment the shape registry initializes itself, by calling registerShape() on BasicShapes, GenMAPPShapes and MIMShapes.

        public static void registerArrow(java.lang.String key,
                                 java.awt.Shape sh,
                                 ArrowShape.FillType fillType,
                                 int lineEndingLength)
        Register an arrow shape
        Parameters:
        key - The key used to identify the arrow shape
        sh - The shape used to draw the stroke
        fillType - The fill type, see ArrowShape
        lineEndingLength - The line ending width

      • registerArrow

        public static void registerArrow(java.lang.String key,
                                 java.awt.Shape sh,
                                 ArrowShape.FillType fillType)
        Register an arrow shape
        Parameters:
        key - The key used to identify the arrow shape
        sh - The shape used to draw the stroke and fill (in case fillType is open or closed)
        fillType - The fill type, see ArrowShape

      • registerAnchor

        public static void registerAnchor(java.lang.String key,
                                  java.awt.Shape sh)

      • getArrow

        public static ArrowShape getArrow(java.lang.String name)
        Returns a named arrow head. The shape is normalized so that it fits with a line that goes along the positive x-axis. The tip of the arrow head is in 0,0.

      • getAnchor

        public static AnchorShape getAnchor(java.lang.String name)
        Returns an anchor shape
